name: Heinrich Cornelius Agrippa
astrologySymbolism: Aries Sun — builder of first comprehensive occult grid
fusionNotes: Mapped planetary, elemental, and angelic forces into tables
Laid foundations for Dee, Fortune, and modern magicians

artifact.description: Seed Grid Plate — lattice of planetary sigils woven into Soyga-like square
artifact.function: Activates correspondences and order within chaos
